dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Hey, Vincent, I've heard about all the gossip going around in school about us. Are you okay?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yeah, I've heard it too. It's a bit annoying, but I know we haven’t done anything wrong.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: I know, but I'm worried it might be affecting you. You know, all this talk and speculation.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: To be honest, it's not just the classmates. My mom believes the rumors too. She thinks we're dating, and no explanation from me seems to work.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Really? That must be tough for you.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yeah, and because of this, I can't call you anymore. My mom won't listen to my explanations, she's just convinced that we're in a relationship.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: That’s so unfair. We're just trying to study hard. But I understand, you need to deal with the situation at home.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I'm really sorry, Yvonne. I don’t want this to affect our friendship or our studies.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: I know, Vincent. You don't need to apologize. We'll find other ways to study together.
